title: nginx-1.12.0 fails with gcc-7.1.0
body:
The command `spack install nginx` fails with the compile errors below.
AFAIK these errors are due to the `-Werror` flag paired with the fairly recent `gcc@7.1.0`.

```
4 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     226        -o objs/src/core/ngx_resolver.o \
     227        src/core/ngx_resolver.c
     228   /home/gip/spack_local/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -c -pipe  -O -W -Wall -Wpointer-arith -Wno-unused-parameter -Werror -g  -I src/core -I src/event -I src/event/modules -I src/os/unix -I objs
 \
     229        -o objs/src/core/ngx_open_file_cache.o \
     230        src/core/ngx_open_file_cache.c
     231   src/core/ngx_murmurhash.c: In function ‘ngx_murmur_hash2’:
  >> 232   src/core/ngx_murmurhash.c:37:11: error: this statement may fall through [-Werror=implicit-fallthrough=]
     233            h ^= data[2] << 16;
     234            ~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     235   src/core/ngx_murmurhash.c:38:5: note: here
     236        case 2:
     237        ^~~~
  >> 238   src/core/ngx_murmurhash.c:39:11: error: this statement may fall through [-Werror=implicit-fallthrough=]
     239            h ^= data[1] << 8;
     240            ~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     241   src/core/ngx_murmurhash.c:40:5: note: here
     242        case 1:
     243        ^~~~
     244   cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
     245   objs/Makefile:470: recipe for target 'objs/src/core/ngx_murmurhash.o' failed
  >> 246   make[1]: *** [objs/src/core/ngx_murmurhash.o] Error 1
     247   make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```
